en.aboutMeDescription: Passionate software engineer with main focus being on Frontend development. I've contributed to various projects, collaborating with different teams to bring ideas to life in the best possible way.
en.myMissionDescription: With my experience covering multiple technologies I keep focusing on creating modern, scalable and user-friendly web applications.
en.missionQuote: Design like you'll maintain it. Because you will. 🚀
en.aboutDescription1: I've been coding for over 4 years, starting my journey in 2021. After getting the hang of HTML, CSS and JavaScript I started freelancing, creating websites for local businesses.
en.aboutDescription2: Later on I started using frameworks like React, Next.js and Laravel. I recreated popular SaaS applications like: Airbnb, LMS, Discord, etc. and even created some small applications myself.
en.aboutDescription3: So far I've worked accross multiple projects with multiple teams using different technologies and tools. I'm always looking for new challenges so I can contribute with my experience and skills.

Satnica.description: Satnica is a web application designed to simplify time tracking for students and employers. It allows students to easily log their work hours, while employers can manage and monitor their team's work time efficiently.

Financial Focus.description: Financial Focus is a web application where users can track their personal finances and get insights into their spending habits using interactive graphs.

Pets of TVZ.description: Pets of TVZ is a simple web application where users (students of University of Applied Sciences in Zagreb) can share information about their pets with one another.

Am I cooked.description: Goofy app for students to check if they are 'cooked' if they start studying now, based on the time left until their exams. This app was made in < 1 hour for fun.

Beriko.description: Company website for Beriko, a company that builds high-quality prefabricated buildings: halls, bungalows, warehouses, workshops and garages.

Klesarstvo Kirinec Dejan.description: Company website for Klesarstvo Kirinec Dejan, a company that specializes in stone carving and shaping, creating custom stone architecture, stone installation and restoration of stone structures.

Neven Jurić.description: Company website for Neven Jurić d.o.o., a company that offers bookkeeping services for small businesses, sole proprietorships, family farms, and citizen associations.

L'avor.description: Company website for L'avor, a company that has years of experience in crafting ceramic furniture, combining cutting-edge production technology with an artistic touch in every unique piece.

Restaurant Royal.description: Simple HTML/CSS/JS/PHP website for a restaurant. Focus is on design.

PentestPad.description: A tool built by pentesters, for pentesters. Designed to solve the real challenges of security testing teams.

Pinky CyberSafe.description: Pinky CyberSafe® is the ultimate cybersecurity solution designed specifically for small and medium enterprises (SMEs).

CCChelp.description: Complete competent compliance for your business. Certs, Equipment & Vehicles, Get, all your Assets certified on time. Never miss your next schedule.

Discord.description: Discord is a free voice, video, and text chat platform designed for communities, friends, and teams to connect and communicate in real time.

Notion.description: Notion is an all-in-one workspace where you can write, plan, organize, and collaborate through notes, databases, tasks, and more.

Spotify.description: Spotify is a digital music streaming platform that gives you access to millions of songs, podcasts, and playlists from artists around the world.

Airbnb.description: Airbnb is an online platform that allows people to rent out their homes or book unique accommodations and experiences around the world.

LMS.description: An LMS (Learning Management System) is a software platform used to create, deliver, and manage educational courses, training programs, or learning and development content.

E-commerce store and admin panel.description: An e-commerce store is an online platform where customers can browse and purchase products, while the admin panel is a backend dashboard that allows store owners to manage products, orders, customers, and store settings.

AI SaaS Companion.description: An AI SaaS Companion is a cloud-based tool powered by artificial intelligence designed to interact with the user based on their input.

Multi-functional AI SaaS.description: A multi-functional AI SaaS platform that can talk, generate music, create videos, design images, and write code—offering an all-in-one creative and productivity companion powered by artificial intelligence.

en.andMore: And there's much more! You can view the rest of the projects that I've worked on here:
en.contactMeDescription: I'm always looking for new challenges and an opportunity to take on exciting projects. If you have a project in mind or need help with something, feel free to contact me.
en.hereYouCanCheckOut: Here you can check out almost all of the projects that I have worked on.

hr.aboutMeDescription: Strastveni sam inženjer softvera s fokusom na Frontend development. Sudjelovao sam u raznim projektima, surađujući s različitim timovima kako bih ideje realizirao na najbolji mogući način.
hr.myMissionDescription: Kroz rad s različitim tehnologijama stalno težim gradnji modernih, skalabilnih i jednostavnih web aplikacija koje korisnicima zaista imaju smisla.
hr.missionQuote: Razvijaj kod kao da ćeš ga održavati. Jer hoćeš. 🚀
hr.aboutDescription1: Programiram više od 4 godine, počevši svoj put 2021. Nakon što sam svladao HTML, CSS i JavaScript, počeo sam freelancati i izrađivati web stranice za lokalne tvrtke.
hr.aboutDescription2: Kasnije sam počeo koristiti frameworke poput Reacta, Next.js-a i Laravela. Rekreirao sam popularne SaaS aplikacije poput: Airbnb-a, LMS-a, Discorda i dr., te sam razvio nekoliko manjih aplikacija samostalno.
hr.aboutDescription3: Sudjelovao sam u brojnim projektima s raznim timovima koristeći različite tehnologije i alate. Uvijek tražim nove izazove kojima mogu doprinijeti svojim iskustvom i vještinama.

Satnica.description: Satnica je web aplikacija dizajnirana da pojednostavi praćenje radnog vremena za studente i poslodavce. Omogućuje studentima jednostavno bilježenje radnih sati, dok poslodavci mogu efikasno upravljati i nadzirati radno vrijeme svog tima.

Financial Focus.description: Financial Focus je web aplikacija gdje korisnici mogu pratiti svoje osobne financije i dobiti uvid u vlastite potrošačke navike pomoću interaktivnih grafova.

Pets of TVZ.description: Pets of TVZ je jednostavna web aplikacija gdje korisnici (studenti Tehničkog veleučilišta u Zagrebu) mogu međusobno dijeliti informacije o svojim kućnim ljubimcima.

Am I cooked.description: Zabavna aplikacija za studente koja provjerava jesu li 'gotovi' ako krenu učiti sada, temeljeno na vremenu preostalom do ispita. Aplikacija je napravljena u < 1 sat iz zabave.

Beriko.description: Web stranica za tvrtku Beriko koja izrađuje visokokvalitetne montažne objekte: hale, bungalove, skladišta, radionice i garaže.

Klesarstvo Kirinec Dejan.description: Web stranica za Klesarstvo Kirinec Dejan, tvrtku specijaliziranu za klesanje i oblikovanje kamena, izradu kamene arhitekture po mjeri, ugradnju kamena i restauraciju kamenih struktura.

Neven Jurić.description: Web stranica za Neven Jurić d.o.o., tvrtku koja nudi knjigovodstvene usluge za male tvrtke, obrte, OPG-ove i udruge građana.

L'avor.description: Web stranica za L'avor, tvrtku s dugogodišnjim iskustvom u izradi keramičkog namještaja, kombinirajući najnoviju proizvodnu tehnologiju s umjetničkim dodirom u svakom jedinstvenom komadu.

Restaurant Royal.description: Jednostavna HTML/CSS/JS/PHP stranica za restoran. Fokus je na dizajnu.

PentestPad.description: Alat izrađen od pentestera, za pentestere. Dizajniran za rješavanje stvarnih izazova timova za sigurnosno testiranje.

Pinky CyberSafe.description: Pinky CyberSafe® je vrhunsko cybersecurity rješenje dizajnirano specifično za male i srednje tvrtke (SME).

CCChelp.description: Potpuna kompetentna usklađenost za vaše poslovanje. Certifikati, oprema i vozila - dobijte sve svoje resurse certificirane na vrijeme. Nikad više ne propustite sljedeći raspored.

Discord.description: Discord je besplatna platforma za glasovni, video i tekstualni razgovor dizajnirana za zajednice, prijatelje i timove kako bi se povezali i komunicirali u stvarnom vremenu.

Notion.description: Notion je all-in-one radni prostor gdje možete pisati, planirati, organizirati i surađivati putem bilješki, baza podataka, zadataka i još mnogo toga.

Spotify.description: Spotify je digitalna streaming platforma koja vam daje pristup milijunima pjesama, podcasta i playlista od umjetnika iz cijelog svijeta.

Airbnb.description: Airbnb je online platforma koja omogućuje ljudima iznajmljivanje njihovih domova ili rezervaciju jedinstvenog smještaja i iskustava diljem svijeta.

LMS.description: LMS (Learning Management System) je softverska platforma koja se koristi za stvaranje, dostavu i upravljanje obrazovnim tečajevima, programima obuke ili sadržajem za učenje i razvoj.

E-commerce store and admin panel.description: E-commerce trgovina je online platforma gdje kupci mogu pregledavati i kupovati proizvode, dok je admin panel pozadinska nadzorna ploča koja vlasnicima trgovine omogućuje upravljanje proizvodima, narudžbama, kupcima i postavkama trgovine.

AI SaaS Companion.description: AI SaaS Companion je cloud alat koji koristi umjetnu inteligenciju, dizajniran za interakciju s korisnikom na temelju njegovog unosa.

Multi-functional AI SaaS.description: Multifunkcionalna AI SaaS platforma koja može razgovarati, generirati glazbu, stvarati videozapise, dizajnirati slike i pisati kod - nudeći sveobuhvatnog kreativnog i produktivnog pomoćnika koji koristi umjetnu inteligenciju.

hr.andMore: A ima još mnogo toga! Ostale projekte na kojima sam radio možete pogledati ovdje:
hr.contactMeDescription: Uvijek tražim nove izazove i priliku za rad na zanimljivim projektima. Ako imate projekt na umu ili trebate pomoć s nečim, slobodno me kontaktirajte.
hr.hereYouCanCheckOut: Ovdje možete pregledati gotovo sve projekte na kojima sam radio.
